Class DestinationCardCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • DestinationCardCheck

  • public class DestinationCardCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    Route Check - Tests if a destination card route has been completed by a player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DestinationCardCheck()
      DestinationCardCheck constructor - //DestinationCard destCard, ArrayList ownedRoutes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isCardCompleted()
      isCardCompleted - returns the boolean containing the verification value.
      void newCard(DestinationCard destCard, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ownedRoutes)
      newCard - reloads the DestinationCardCheck object with a new destination card and ownedRoutes
      void verify(java.lang.String currentCity)
      verify - recursive function to check if the second destination of a DestinationCard object is reachable using its owner's controlled routes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • DestinationCardCheck

        public DestinationCardCheck()
        DestinationCardCheck constructor - //DestinationCard destCard, ArrayList ownedRoutes

    • Method Detail

      • newCard

        public void newCard(DestinationCard destCard,
                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ownedRoutes)
        newCard - reloads the DestinationCardCheck object with a new destination card and ownedRoutes
        Parameters:
        destCard - - a new DestinationCard object to be verified
        ownedRoutes - - an ArrayList of strings containing the controlled routes of the owner of the Destination Card

      • isCardCompleted

        public boolean isCardCompleted()
        isCardCompleted - returns the boolean containing the verification value.
        Returns:
        destTwoVisited - true if card is completed by player, false if card was not completed by player

      • verify

        public void verify(java.lang.String currentCity)
        verify - recursive function to check if the second destination of a DestinationCard object is reachable using its owner's controlled routes.
